member.name: M:MikroBusNet.Hardware.Graphics.Rgb8ToBgr5(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts a RGB8 bitmap to a BGR565 bitmap using byte arrays.

member.name: M:MikroBusNet.Hardware.Graphics.Rgb8ToBgr5(System.Byte[],System.UInt16[])
